entry.content:
Each programmer in his life should: learn a git, do a to-do list, and also make a blog.

If you are python programmer, I recommend you to do your personal blog with help of python.

My current blog created with help of Pelican using Flex theme and hosted at GitHub.

The main files you should pay attention to are: pelicanconf.py and publishconf.py.

Pelican has a great quickstart section, after reading that, you will already have generated the main template for your blog.

I recommend you create repository called 'blog' and push these files to this repo.

So, add content and your blog is ready. Pretty simple, right?
